synopsis.text:
It is in the realm of Shinigami that a curious deity approaches Ryuk to learn about the human world. Instead, Ryuk recounts the intriguing tale of a brilliant young man named Light Yagami and his formidable adversary, L. This retelling, known as "Death Note: Relight - Visions of a God," offers a condensed version of the original series, with updated dialogue and a few new scenes.

Light Yagami, an exceptionally intelligent high school student, finds himself disenchanted with the world around him. His mundane life takes a dramatic turn when he discovers the Death Note, a mysterious book that possesses the power to kill anyone whose name is written within its pages. With the Death Note in his possession, Light embarks on a mission to eradicate evil from the world, positioning himself as a divine figure.

However, his crusade does not go unnoticed. A mysterious detective known only as 'L' emerges as a formidable opponent, vowing to put an end to Light's self-proclaimed divine reign. As these two intellectual titans clash, a deadly game of cat and mouse unfolds, leaving only room for one victor. Who will emerge triumphant from this battle of wits?
